arts.ttl: Celtic vs Kilmarnock LIVE as Simpson-Pusey handed surprise start by Martin O'Neill
arts.sum: It's back to league action for the champions as they take on struggling Kilmarnock at Parkhead

Second-placed Celtic take on Kilmarnock at Parkhead on Sunday afternoon, as the Hoops - who are hoping to keep pressure on league leaders Hearts - host a Killie side that are dropping like a stone. C...

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Kilmarnock – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Celtic and Kilmarnock go head-to-head at Celtic Park on Sunday afternoon in a crucial Scottish Premiership encounter. The hosts will be looking to bounce back from their midweek Europa League disappointment. Kilmarnock, meanwhile, are desperate to end a worrying run of defeats that has seen them slip down the table. The home side will be eager to recover from their recent setback in the Europa League, while Kilmarnock are determined to halt a troubling sequence of losses that has pushed them down the league standings. arts.ttl: All 6 Scottish Premiership weekend predictions - Week 12
arts.sum: After last week's Scottish League Cup action, all 12 teams are back in action in the Scottish Premiership this week and Tom Hill has made a prediction for every match.
